826514418572436974-Maze.turnTooltip: Turns Pegman left or right by 90 degrees.
412027119640112732-Maze.ifTooltip:
If there is a path in the specified direction, 
then do some actions.
6175401358049603739-Maze.ifelseTooltip: If there is a path in the specified direction, then do the first block of actions. Otherwise, do the second block of actions.
1190064103412776740-Maze.whileTooltip: Repeat the enclosed actions until finish point is reached.
7358214333593766572-Maze.nextLevel: Congratulations! Are you ready to proceed to level %1?
7149849676690329496-Maze.finalLevel: Congratulations! You have solved the final level.
4051416073809352347-Maze.oneTopBlock: On this level, you need to stack together all of the blocks in the white workspace.
2370415430586059806-Maze.title: Maze
3542684864087093156-Maze.instructions1: A program is a sequence of blocks.  Stack a couple of 'move forward' blocks together to help me reach the goal.
3107464560858837706-Maze.instructions2: What is the sequence of steps to follow this path?
4117834464422802314-Maze.instructions3: Computers have limited memory.  Reach the end of this path using only two blocks.  Use 'repeat' to run a block more than once.
7924052971858977034-Maze.instructions4: Reach the goal using only five blocks.
5504218682327601531-Maze.instructions5: Pegman will have to turn left when he cannot go straight.
7837544939813721855-Maze.instructions6: An 'if' block will do something only if the condition is true.  Try turning left if there is a path to the left.
4142991828936593951-Maze.instructions7: This maze looks more complicated than the previous one, but it is not.
8369157115089930453-Maze.instructions8: You can use more than one 'if' block.
7801554455370029732-Maze.instructions9: If-else blocks will do one thing or the other.
4572857545803877392-Maze.instructions10: Can you solve this complicated maze?  Try following the left-hand wall.  Advanced programmers only!
